subject: p16319601
History: Subtotal colectomy with end ileostomy with pleural effusion status post chest tube placement. Please assess for change in pleural effusion.
Findings: Portable chest radiograph demonstrates unremarkable mediastinal, hilar, and cardiac contours. Minimal stable atelectasis noted in the bilateral lower lungs, right greater than left. Bilateral chest tubes projecting over lung bases with no reaccumulation of pleural effusions or pneumothorax. Other lines and tubes in appropriate position.
